Preživeo jutro, ali ga pojeo mrak: Bajern otpustio Nika Kovača
Šampion Nemačke i zvanično razrešio trenera funkcije

03 Nov 2019

Niko Kovač nije više trener Bajerna iz Minhena! Pod vinjetom ekskluzivno, urednik SportBilda i najobavešteniji čovek kada su u pitanju dešavanja u Minhenu Kristijan Falk objavio je prvi u Nemačkoj da je hrvatski trener sporazumno raskinuo ugovor sa Bavarcima, što je pola časa kasnije potvrio zvanično i šampion Nemačke na svojim stranicama.
To je ujedno i rezultat celodnevnih nagađanja oko budućnosti Kovača na klupi šampiona Nemačke, koja se naslućivala posle sramotnog poraza od Ajntrahta u Frankfurtu od 5:1. Iako se tokom dana pojavila informacija da će Hrvat preživeti i dobiti poverenje da još dve utakmice (Olimpijakos i Borusija iz Dortmunda) sačuva posao, preokret je usledio ove večeri, pa je Kovač bivši trener Bajerna.

Survived the morning but was eaten by darkness: Bayern fired Nick Kovac
Champion of Germany and officially dismissed the function coach

03 Nov 2019

Nobody is blacksmith Coach Bayern Munich anymore! Under the vignette exclusively, SportBild editor and most informed man when it comes to Munich events Christian Falk announced the first in Germany that a Croatian coach had mutually terminated his contract with the Bavarians, which was officially confirmed by the German champion on his site half an hour later.
It is also the result of all-day speculation about the future of Kovacs on the German champions' bench, which was felt after the infamous 5-1 defeat to Eintracht Frankfurt. Although information emerged throughout the day that the Croat would survive and be trusted to keep two more games (Olympiacos and Borussia Dortmund), a turnaround ensued this evening, with Kovac being the former Bayern coach.
